module.description: the name of the module which provides the service, or 'core'

class.description: the name of the class or type or something inside the module, which qualifies the service type, should be 'coreController' as provided by 'core'

listenPort.description: TCP listening port number for internal service management

service.description: the name of the messaging service to which the coreController may connect (should be enough, but not used at the moment)

host.description: the hostname to use to connect to the message bus (should be enough, but not used at the moment, only localhost being managed for now)

port.description: the port number to use to connect to the message bus

alivePeriod.description: interval (ms) between two alive publications, defaulting to 1mn
